languages.text: [Льстиво улыбнуться] "Я мог{mf||ла} лишь мечтать о том, что встречу столь мудрое и просвещенное существо!"

traits.locale_text: [Льстиво улыбнуться] "Я мог{mf||ла} лишь мечтать о том, что встречу столь мудрое и просвещенное существо!"

languages.text: [Smile obsequiously] "Until this day, I could only dream of meeting such a wise and enlightened being!"
languages.original_text: [Льстиво улыбнуться] "Я мог{mf||ла} лишь мечтать о том, что встречу столь мудрое и просвещенное существо!"

traits.locale_text: [Smile obsequiously] "Until this day, I could only dream of meeting so wise and enlightened a being!"
[Smile obsequiously] "Until this day, I could only dream of meeting so wise and enlightened a being!"
[Smile obsequiously] "Until this day, I could only dream of meeting such a wise and enlightened being!"
[Smile obsequiously] "Until this day, I could only dream of meeting such a wise and enlightened being!"
[Smile obsequiously] "Until this day, I could only dream of meeting such a wise and enlightened being!"
[Smile obsequiously] "Until this day, I could only dream of meeting such a wise and enlightened being!"

languages.text: [Sourire de manière obséquieuse] « J'ai toujours rêvé de rencontrer un individu sage et clairvoyant comme vous ! »
languages.original_text: [Smile obsequiously] "Until this day, I could only dream of meeting such a wise and enlightened being!"

traits.locale_text: [Sourire de manière obséquieuse] « J'ai toujours rêvé de rencontrer un individu sage et clairvoyant comme vous ! »

languages.text: [露出谄媚的笑容]“我从来没想过能遇到像你这么机敏、睿智的人，但今天，我的梦想实现了！”
languages.original_text: [Smile obsequiously] "Until this day, I could only dream of meeting such a wise and enlightened being!"

traits.locale_text: [露出谄媚的笑容]“我从来没想过能遇到像你这么机敏、睿智的人，但今天，我的梦想实现了！”

languages.text: [Unterwürfig lächeln] "Bis zu diesem Tag konnte ich nur davon träumen, einem solch weisen und erleuchteten Wesen zu begegnen!"
languages.original_text: [Smile obsequiously] "Until this day, I could only dream of meeting such a wise and enlightened being!"

traits.locale_text: [Unterwürfig lächeln] "Bis zu diesem Tag konnte ich nur davon träumen, einem solch weisen und erleuchteten Wesen zu begegnen!"

languages.text: [Sonreír servilmente] «Hasta hoy, ¡no creí que conocería a un ser tan sabio e iluminado!».
languages.original_text: [Smile obsequiously] "Until this day, I could only dream of meeting such a wise and enlightened being!"

traits.locale_text: [Sonreír servilmente] «Hasta hoy, ¡no creí que conocería a un ser tan sabio e iluminado!».

languages.text: ［卑屈にほほ笑む］「今日まで、私はこのような賢明で悟りを開いた存在に会うことを夢見ることしかできなかった！」
languages.original_text: [Smile obsequiously] "Until this day, I could only dream of meeting such a wise and enlightened being!"

traits.locale_text: ［卑屈にほほ笑む］「今日まで、私はこのような賢明で悟りを開いた存在に会うことを夢見ることしかできなかった！」

languages.text: [Dalkavukça gülümse] "Bugüne kadar böylesine bilge ve aydınlanmış bir varlıkla karşılaşabileceğimi hayal bile etmemiştim!"
languages.original_text: [Smile obsequiously] "Until this day, I could only dream of meeting such a wise and enlightened being!"

traits.locale_text: [Dalkavukça gülümse] "Bugüne kadar böylesine bilge ve aydınlanmış bir varlıkla karşılaşabileceğimi hayal bile etmemiştim!"
